https://tmrev.io/movie/304308-Disfarmer: A Portrait of America 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pMDOJIHvqeOUBF7hHxJhKtootkW.jpg Mike Disfarmer, small town portrait photographer turned posthumous art star. This is the story of an eccentric curmudgeon and artistic icon whose powerful pictures of depression-era USA have left an unlikely mark on the modern Manhattan art world. Disfarmer: A Portrait of America
